column4: help, I downloaded java and I am trying to create a symbolic link to a file in the usr/lib/Mozilla folder...but it says I don't have permission...

help, I downloaded java and I am trying to create a symbolic link to a file in the usr/lib/mozilla/plugins folder...but it says I don't have permission...all of this is in an attempt to get limewire to work.....
user accounts probably don't have access to that directory, use sudo?
You need to use sudo before every command.
